item.title: I tried morphological conversion of the image with Python + OpenCV
item.description: ## Introduction With image processing, it is not always possible to prepare beautiful images. Images often contain noise. If there is noise, it may be removed using a method called “smoothing” or “morphological transformation”. This time, we will use Python to perform morphological transformation of the image using OpenCV. *For details on “smoothing”, refer to the following. I tried “smoothing” the image with Python + OpenCV What is morphological conversion Morphological transformation is mainly the process of “shrink” and “expansion” for binary images.

item.title: Free Python execution environment Google Colaboratory memo
item.description: # What is Google Colaboratory Jupyter notebook environment running on Google’s cloud. https://colab.research.google.com/notebooks/welcome.ipynb It’s free to use and no environment is required, so it’s convenient for learning Python. In addition, GPU and TPU can be used to reduce machine learning execution time. usage limit It is available free of charge, but there is a 12 hour continuous usage limit. Be careful when using machine learning for a long time because the virtual machine will be disconnected after 12 hours.
